addQueryDepthLimit.description: Specifies how deep the 'Add query' functionality would go

alert.disableWarnings.description: Specifies if warning alerts should be disabled

disablePushNotification.description: Specifies if the push notifications should be disabled

enableExperimental.description:
Enable experimental features in Altair.
Note: The features might be unstable

historyDepth.description: Specifies the number of items allowed in the history pane

plugin.list.description: Specifies a list of enabled plugins (requires enableExperimental to be true)

request.withCredentials.description: Specifies if requests should be sent with credentials (with cookies) or not

schema.reloadOnStart.description: Specifies if the schema should be reloaded when the app starts

tabSize.description: Specifies the tab size in the editor

theme.editorFontFamily.description: Specifies the font family for the editors

theme.editorFontSize.description: Specifies the font size for the editors

theme.fontsize.description:
Specifies the base font size
(Default size - 24)
